thread.title: Will Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Enter The List Of All Time Top 5 Telugu Movies?
thread.title_full: Will Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Enter The List Of All Time Top 5 Telugu Movies?

title: Will Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Enter The List Of All Time Top 5 Telugu Movies?
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Tuesday, October 13, 2015, 17:51 [IST] 
It is a litmus test for Bruce Lee since it has the burden of proving Ram Charan as the reigning king of Telugu box office once again. Bruce Lee - The Fighter (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
It is known that the actor's last release did not actually spill much magic considering its box office performance and his forthcoming release Bruce Lee draws a lot of trade expectations. 
Apparently, Baahubali evidently increased the Telugu box office potential and has brought in some kind of pressure on Bruce Lee, as it is expected to pull off the same stamina like Srimanthudu managed to do. 
Bruce Lee is releasing in more than 2200 screens worldwide and has number of attractions including Megastar Chiranjeevi's cameo, which itself is a great crowd pulling factor. 
So, according to the trade estimates, Ram Charan-Sreenu Vaitla's Bruce Lee must atleast enter the list of top 5 Telugu movies, to actually prove the Megapower Star's box office potential. 
Increased ticket rates also adds as a bonus for the probable records of Bruce Lee . In this scenario, there are several discussions going on among fan clubs as in which film from current Top 5 looses its place for Bruce Lee. 
On that note, Check out the list of current all time top 5 industry hits of Telugu movies and their collections, in the slides below. Will Bruce Lee Enter The List Of Top 5 Telugu Movies? 1/7 Baahubali 
Baahubali Telugu version collected a total share of 186 Cr worldwide after it's full run and stood as the all time industry hit of Telugu cinema. Will Bruce Lee Enter The List Of Top 5 Telugu Movies? 2/7 Srimanthudu 
Srimanthudu stood tall next to Baahubali in the second place by collecting approximately 81 Cr share world wide. Will Bruce Lee Enter The List Of Top 5 Telugu Movies? 3/7 
Attarintiki Daredi collected a share of 74 Cr worldwide and is holding the third position. Will Bruce Lee Enter The List Of Top 5 Telugu Movies? 4/7 Magadheera 
Magadheera was in the Top 5 films of TFI for a long time now with a worldwide share of 71 Cr, which marks its place at number 4. Will Bruce Lee Enter The List Of Top 5 Telugu Movies? 5/7 
Pawan Kalyan's Gabbar Singh is in fifth place with a share of 61 Cr worldwide. Will Bruce Lee Enter The List Of Top 5 Telugu Movies? 6/7 Bruce Lee 
If the film manages to replace Srimanthudu then four out of top 5 would be of Mega films. If Bruce Lee replaces AD, MD or GS then it is a mega win on mega. Meanwhile, leave your guesses in the comment box below. You might like
